title: Web3 & The Decentralized Future: An In-depth Exploration
summary: Join leading experts as they delve into the core concepts of Web3, blockchain technology, NFTs, DAOs, and their potential impact on various industries. Interactive Q&A session included.

title: Workshop: Ethical Considerations in AI Development
organizer: EWU CSE Department & AI Ethics Initiative
summary: A hands-on workshop designed for students and developers to understand and address ethical challenges in designing and deploying AI systems. Includes case studies and group discussions.

title: Data Science Career Path: Insights from Industry Professionals
summary: Connect with experienced data scientists and analysts to learn about career opportunities, required skills, and industry trends in the field of data science and analytics.

title: Recap: Python for Beginners Bootcamp
summary: A successful 3-day online bootcamp covering Python fundamentals, data structures, and an introduction to web scraping. Recordings and materials are now available.

title: AI Trends 2025: Innovations & Opportunities
summary: Explore the latest advancements and future directions in Artificial Intelligence with industry leaders. Topics include generative AI, ethical AI, and real-world applications.
